review: My experience with Dr.sruthi ravindra was a very memorable and safe one. The treatment was conducted with atmost hygiene and the overall experience was good. Staff had woren masks and had sanitized the objects very well. I had visited the clinic with my two children who had also had a great experience . The treatment was excuted very well and my problems were cured by the doctor in a well versed manner. Overall my oral hygiene showed great improvement and I received prescription with products that would help in the long run . Totally recomend going to this clinic handled by doctor Sruthi ravindra who not only cured my problem but also ensured my safety throughout the whole experience. It was a pleasant visit.

Shruti mam, Very very patient and cooperative. Make you feel home n comfortable like a family. Going out of her way to get dentist teeth done nicely. Highly recommend for entire Bangalore and India if they are suffering from any dental problems from a long time, you cannot find a better doctor n her peers like madhuri who also did her bit nicely.

I approached Dr.Sruthi Ravindra on a friend's recommendation and I'm very happy with the treatment. She explained well about my problem and various treatments available. Very caring , efficient and on time for every appointment.  I'm happy with the treatment and I would definitely recommend her.

Underwent cavity filling, RCT and crowning at Dr Sruthi's clinic, Smile Solutions. I can vouch for Dr Sruthi's high level of expertise, skill and patient centricity . She spent time and patiently explained me the procedure I am required to undergo and answered all my questions. Its been 1 month since and no troubles faced till now. I have no second thoughts in recommending to consult Dr Sruthi for any dental related problems.

I visited Dr.Shruthi for wisdom tooth extraction. She spoke very friendly and took utmost care till I get fully recovered. We contacted her couple of times after the treatment and she understood , explained and treated us very well . I referred my cousin and they were also very happy with the way she receives , knowledge that she has and the treatment given by her

I would definitely recommend Dr.Shruthi for all your dental  needs

I have visited Dr Shruthi for root canal treatment recently and would rate the overall experience as excellent.diagnosis was quickly root caused ,available options along with risks associated also were highlighted in the conversation.Coming to treatment part, her skills demonstrated thorough know how on procedures which was evident in my speedy recovery.she is a good patient listener .would highly recommend for any dental issues .
Amazing experience with doctors very professional very friendly and great work. Very Happy with the service

Highly recommend Dr Shruti for people needing dental care in and around JP Nagar.
My RCT was very well treated by her. She takes personal care to treat her patients.

**** **** ****** * **** **** **** **** She has lot of patience and ground to earth. Listening to patient very well, which made me to trust her in the advice. I prefer everyone to take appointment with this doctor for better results.

** ** **** ******* *** deals the patient well.
Has good patience to listen to our problem and advice us what's the best for us, in one word she is a one stop solution for our dental issues.
Thank you Dr. Sruthi.

I am someone who had recurrent tooth/gum issues and have seen several dentists in Bangalore. I can safely say my search has ended with Dr Shruthi.
Very very proficient and a caring doctor and most importantly not here to extort money like others. She has helped me fall out of this viscious circle of visiting a dentist every few months. Would highly recommend Dr Shruthi!

I had to go for Dental implants treatment and the treatment was done by Dr. Sruthi. She is really technical in detail and resolved all my doubt's that i had asked during my treatment to make me understand the treatment process. My implants treatment is successful and I would recommend anyone with out a second thought to consult Dr. Sruthi for any Dental related issues.
